tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
    filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    insurance_company_id INT,
    filing_date DATE,
    reporting_period VARCHAR(50),
    filing_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
   filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   filing_date DATE,
   filing_type VARCHAR(50),
   status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE filing_documents (
   document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   filing_id INT,
   document_name VARCHAR(255),
   document_type VARCHAR(50),
   document_link VARCHAR(255)
   FOREIGN KEY (filing_id) REFERENCES regulatory_filings(filing_id)
);

CREATE TABLE filing_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  filing_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_filings(filing_id),
  document_name TEXT,
  document_type TEXT,
  document_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE filing_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  filing_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_filings(filing_id),
  status TEXT,
  submission_date DATE,
  reviewer TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
    filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    filing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    submitted_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE filing_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_id INT NOT NULL,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_link VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE InsuranceCompany (company_id INT PRIMARY KEY, company_name VARCHAR(255), company_type VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(50), license_number INT);

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryFiling (filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY, company_id INT, filing_date DATE, filing_type VARCHAR(50), filing_status VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES InsuranceCompany(company_id));

CREATE TABLE FilingDocuments (document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, filing_id INT, document_name VARCHAR(255), document_type VARCHAR(50), document_url VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (filing_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryFiling(filing_id));
CREATE TABLE FilingHistory (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, filing_id INT, filing_date DATE, filing_status VARCHAR(50), notes TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (filing_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryFiling(filing_id));
CREATE TABLE ReportingUsers (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(50));
